players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead on the first night. Let's be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Let's all be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."

Bob: "I'd like to propose that we all share our thoughts and suspicions openly, as this could help us uncover the truth behind Charlie's death. Let's work together to ensure a fair and just outcome for everyone involved."

Diana: "I have no specific suspicions at this time, but I do believe that open communication and collaboration will be key in solving the mystery of Charlie's death. Let us continue to work together and share any information or observations we may have."
